text: Carin Mannheimer (Karin Birgitta Mannheimer; Jacobson 17 August 1934 – 11 July 2014) was a Swedish dramatist, screenwriter, author and film director.Birthday: Carin MannheimerCarin Mannheimer Mannheimer was known for her book Rapport om kvinnor ('Report on Women') (1969). According to a text message sent by her daughter to the newspaper Göteborgs-Posten Mannheimer died unexpectedly on 11 July 2014 at the age of 79.Carin Mannheimer har avlidit ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swedish movie directors Category:Swedish movie producers Category:Swedish screenwriters
title: Carin Mannheimer
